titles.title: A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to provide that dividend and interest income of individuals not be taxed at rates in excess of the maximum capital gains rate.
A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to provide that dividend and interest income of individuals not be taxed at rates in excess of the maximum capital gains rate.

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Finance.

bill.summary: Amends the Internal Revenue Code to provide that dividends and interest income shall be taxed as net capital gain.
